languages.text: "Ну вы же стоите передо мной, не так ли? Пока ваш... статус был неочевиден, я предпочел не подвергать реквизициям ресурсы протектората фон Валанциус. Ваши люди успешно справлялись с агентами Уралона Жестокого и налетами ксеносов, и мне было этого достаточно. Теперь же пришла пора бросить на весы ваши могущество и таланты".

"Are you not standing before me now? While your... status remained unclear, I preferred not to requisition the resources of the von Valancius protectorate. Your people dealt with Uralon the Cruel's agents and with xenos raids, and that was enough for me. But now is the time to add your might and talents to the scales."
languages.original_text: "Ну вы же стоите передо мной, не так ли? Пока ваш... статус был неочевиден, я предпочел не подвергать реквизициям ресурсы протектората фон Валанциус. Ваши люди успешно справлялись с агентами Уралона Жестокого и налетами ксеносов, и мне было этого достаточно. Теперь же пришла пора бросить на весы ваши могущество и таланты".

traits.locale_text: "Are you not standing before me now? While your... status remained unclear, I preferred not to requisition the resources of the von Valancius protectorate. Your people dealt with Uralon the Cruel's agents and with xenos raids, and that was enough for me. But now is the time to add your might and talents to the scales."

"Are you not standing before me now? While your... status remained unclear, I preferred not to requisition the resources of the von Valancius protectorate. Your people dealt with Uralon the Cruel's agents and with xenos raids, and that was enough for me. But now is the time to add your might and talents to the scales."

"Are you not standing before me now? While your... status remained unclear, I preferred not to requisition the resources of the von Valancius protectorate. Your people dealt with Uralon the Cruel's agents and with xenos raids, and that was enough for me. But now is the time to add your might and talents to the scales."

"Are you not standing before me now? While your... status remained unclear, I preferred not to requisition the resources of the von Valancius protectorate. Your people dealt with Uralon the Cruel's agents and with xenos raids, and that was enough for me. But now is the time to add your might and talents to the scales."

languages.text: “但你现在不是正站在我面前吗？当你的……情况还不明确的时候，我并不愿意动用冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的资源。你的人解决了残暴者乌拉隆的特工，击退了异形的不断袭击，这对我而言已经足够了。不过现在，是时候让你的力量与才能发挥更加重要的作用了。”
languages.original_text: "Are you not standing before me now? While your... status remained unclear, I preferred not to requisition the resources of the von Valancius protectorate. Your people dealt with Uralon the Cruel's agents and with xenos raids, and that was enough for me. But now is the time to add your might and talents to the scales."

traits.locale_text: “但你现在不是正站在我面前吗？当你的……情况还不明确的时候，我并不愿意动用冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的资源。你的人解决了残暴者乌拉隆的特工，击退了异形的不断袭击，这对我而言已经足够了。不过现在，是时候让你的力量与才能发挥更加重要的作用了。”

languages.text: «Está ante mí, ¿no? Mientras su... estado era incierto, prefería no recurrir a los recursos del protectorado von Valancius. Su gente se ocupaba de los agentes de Uralon el Cruel y de las incursiones de xenos y con eso me bastaba. Pero ahora es el momento de añadir su poder y sus talentos a la balanza».
languages.original_text: "Are you not standing before me now? While your... status remained unclear, I preferred not to requisition the resources of the von Valancius protectorate. Your people dealt with Uralon the Cruel's agents and with xenos raids, and that was enough for me. But now is the time to add your might and talents to the scales."

traits.locale_text: «Está ante mí, ¿no? Mientras su... estado era incierto, prefería no recurrir a los recursos del protectorado von Valancius. Su gente se ocupaba de los agentes de Uralon el Cruel y de las incursiones de xenos y con eso me bastaba. Pero ahora es el momento de añadir su poder y sus talentos a la balanza».

languages.text: 「今、私の前にいるではないか？お前の…立場はあいまいだったが、フォン・ヴァランシウス朝の保護領に資源を求めはしない。お前の臣民は残酷なウラロンのエージェントども、そして異種族の襲撃に対処した。それで十分だ。だが、今はお前の力と才能を測る時だ」
languages.original_text: "Are you not standing before me now? While your... status remained unclear, I preferred not to requisition the resources of the von Valancius protectorate. Your people dealt with Uralon the Cruel's agents and with xenos raids, and that was enough for me. But now is the time to add your might and talents to the scales."

traits.locale_text: 「今、私の前にいるではないか？お前の…立場はあいまいだったが、フォン・ヴァランシウス朝の保護領に資源を求めはしない。お前の臣民は残酷なウラロンのエージェントども、そして異種族の襲撃に対処した。それで十分だ。だが、今はお前の力と才能を測る時だ」

languages.text: « N'êtes-vous pas justement devant moi ? Tant que votre... statut reste flou, je préfère ne pas réquisitionner les ressources du protectorat von Valancius. Vos hommes se sont occupés des agents d'Uralon le Cruel et des assauts des xénos, ce qui m'a paru suffisant. Mais il est aujourd'hui temps de mettre votre force et vos talents à contribution. »
languages.original_text: "Are you not standing before me now? While your... status remained unclear, I preferred not to requisition the resources of the von Valancius protectorate. Your people dealt with Uralon the Cruel's agents and with xenos raids, and that was enough for me. But now is the time to add your might and talents to the scales."

traits.locale_text: « N'êtes-vous pas justement devant moi ? Tant que votre... statut reste flou, je préfère ne pas réquisitionner les ressources du protectorat von Valancius. Vos hommes se sont occupés des agents d'Uralon le Cruel et des assauts des xénos, ce qui m'a paru suffisant. Mais il est aujourd'hui temps de mettre votre force et vos talents à contribution. »

languages.text: "Steht Ihr jetzt etwa nicht vor mir? Solange Euer ... Status unklar war, zog ich es vor, die Ressourcen des Protektorats von Valancius nicht zu requirieren. Eure Leute hatten mit Agenten von Uralon dem Grausamen und mit Xenos-Angriffen zu schaffen, und das reichte mir. Aber jetzt ist die Zeit gekommen, Eure Macht und Eure Talente in die Waagschale zu werfen."
languages.original_text: "Are you not standing before me now? While your... status remained unclear, I preferred not to requisition the resources of the von Valancius protectorate. Your people dealt with Uralon the Cruel's agents and with xenos raids, and that was enough for me. But now is the time to add your might and talents to the scales."

traits.locale_text: "Steht Ihr jetzt etwa nicht vor mir? Solange Euer ... Status unklar war, zog ich es vor, die Ressourcen des Protektorats von Valancius nicht zu requirieren. Eure Leute hatten mit Agenten von Uralon dem Grausamen und mit Xenos-Angriffen zu schaffen, und das reichte mir. Aber jetzt ist die Zeit gekommen, Eure Macht und Eure Talente in die Waagschale zu werfen."

languages.text: "Karşımda durmuyor musun işte? Durumun... Muallaktayken von Valancius protektorasından kaynak talep etme tercihinde bulunmadım. Seninkiler, Zalim Uralon'un hizmetkârlarını ve zeno baskınlarını göğüsledi. Bu kadarı benim için yeterliydi. Fakat heybetini ve becerilerini saflarımıza katma vakti artık gelmiştir."
languages.original_text: "Are you not standing before me now? While your... status remained unclear, I preferred not to requisition the resources of the von Valancius protectorate. Your people dealt with Uralon the Cruel's agents and with xenos raids, and that was enough for me. But now is the time to add your might and talents to the scales."
